assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: DKK Co., Ltd. engages in manufacture and sale of telecommunication and radio frequency equipment in Japan and internationally. The company's telecommunication equipment include mobile communication infrastructure systems comprising base station antenna/radio equipment, small antennas, peripheral equipment, and mobile communication towers, as well as provides cellular base station construction and maintenance services; and broadcasting products, such as broadcasting and microwave antennas, medium and short wave antennas, steel towers, office, power supply apparatus, and FPU rotators, as well as provides broadcasting construction and maintenance services. It also offers digital disaster prevention administrative radio/fire and emergency digital radio, multi-channel access, micro line antenna, and satellite communication products; aerial surveillance cameras, tsunami evacuation towers, disaster prevention information network systems, and telescopic columns, as well as maintenance services; CATV construction and telescopic columns; LED aviation obstacle lights, wind power towers, beacon lights, and fuel cells; and engages in surveillance camera system business, as well as defense related business. In addition, the company provides induction heating equipment and devices; high frequency oscillators; IoT function and waveform monitors; heating coils; high frequency application equipment; and vacuum furnace. DKK Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1950 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
